info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 14 at 1:01PM MDT until October 15 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo CO
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado...
Rio Grande near Del Norte
.Upstream flood flows on the South Fork Rio Grande will move through the Rio Grande through Del Norte this evening. The river is expected to crest at or slightly above flood stage this evening.
For the Upper Rio Grande River...including Rio Grande near Del Norte...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Rio Grande near Rio Grande near Del Norte.
* WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, Minor Flood. The Del Norte Riverwalk Trail floods.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 5.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.5 feet on 06/18/1995. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
Next issuance statement time late tonight at 115 AM MDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING
